page.title: 20BURGHFIELD COM'N-CONCLUSION
page.content:
BURGHFIELD COMMON is a pleasant,rural, village in West Berkshire.We hope that this section of the Domesday Disc has been helpful to the user,and that the information provided illustrates life in the village.In 1985,a large resid- ential area was being built to meet central government housing require- ments.A major fear of villagers is that this may harm the village's appeal. Various groups have been involved in collecting and processing the data for this section.These groups are.... { THE SIXTH FORM OF THE WILLINK SCHOOL, { 4TH YEAR PUPILS AT GARLAND COUNTY { JUNIOR SCHOOL, } { PUPILS AT MRS BLANDS INFANT'S SCHOOL. All of these schools are in Burghfield Common.
{}
